name: Eclipse (itch) (jaxrohr13)
description:
Read The Description!

no more will you let them keep you here and abuse your power  this... sun clan will pay  escape in 20 seconds before the guard can call reinforcements  wasd  or arrow keys to move  space to cast your shield  DEFEND TO ATTACK  don't touch red platforms

This is my first time using DragonRuby and I really enjoyed it! I think I'm gonna become a full-time Dragon Rider after this. Thanks to the devs and judges for their patience and forgiveness.
